site_name: Balfron Tower, 7 St Leonards Road, London
description: Application under section 19 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 for variation of condition 9 (CCTV) and 10 (Lighting Assessment) of listed building consent dated 23/12/2015, ref: PA/15/02555, which gave consent for 'External and internal physical alterations and refurbishment works to balfron tower, including: new fenestration; alterations to flat layouts; erection of cornice; replacement of boiler house flues; alterations to car parking, cycle parking and refuse storage arrangements; lighting; hard and soft landscaping and associated works.'  The application seeks to replace the wording of both condition 9 and 10 to allow for partial discharge based on construction sequencing for the respective works.
